name: designsetgo/accordion
title: Accordion
description: Create accessible accordion sections with customizable icons and behavior for FAQs and content organization.

attributeDescriptions.allowMultipleOpen: Allow multiple accordion items to be expanded simultaneously
attributeDescriptions.iconStyle: Visual style for the expand/collapse indicator icon
attributeDescriptions.iconPosition: Position of the expand/collapse icon relative to the title
attributeDescriptions.borderBetween: Show a horizontal border between accordion items
attributeDescriptions.borderBetweenColor: Color of the border between accordion items
attributeDescriptions.itemGap: Vertical spacing between accordion items (CSS value)
attributeDescriptions.openBackgroundColor: Background color for expanded accordion items
attributeDescriptions.openTextColor: Text color for expanded accordion items
attributeDescriptions.hoverBackgroundColor: Background color when hovering over an accordion item
attributeDescriptions.hoverTextColor: Text color when hovering over an accordion item

attributes.content: An accordion is a vertically stacked list of items that can be expanded or collapsed to show or hide content.

attributes.title: How do I use this block?

attributes.content: Add accordion items and customize the title. You can add any content inside each item using the block editor.
